original_text: Until the Lord removed Israel out of his sight, as he had said by all his servants the prophets. So was Israel carried away out of their own land to Assyria unto this day.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 종 모든 선지자를 통하여 하신 말씀대로 드디어 이스라엘을 그 앞에서 내쫓으신지라 이스라엘이 고향에서 앗수르에 사로잡혀 가서 오늘까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: Until the Lord removed Israel out of his sight
as he had said by all his servants the prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 종 선지자들을 통해 말씀하신 대로

sentences.original_text: So was Israel carried away out of their own land
